title: Attacks on Female Journalists & Public Figures
summary: Trump has a pattern of misogynistic attacks on female journalists and public figures, often using degrading and appearance-based insults.
keyFacts: Megyn Kelly: 'You could see there was blood coming out of her eyes. Blood coming out of her wherever.'
Mika Brzezinski: 'Low IQ Crazy Mika,' 'bleeding badly from a face-lift'
Carly Fiorina: 'Look at that face! Would anyone vote for that?'
Katy Tur: 'Little Katy,' called her out from rally stage
Heidi Cruz: Retweeted unflattering photo comparing her to Melania
